sentences.en: A Would you like to seethe bill, sir?
sentences.cn: 先生,您要看帐单 吗 ?

sentences.en: And thou shalt take the ram of the consecration seethe his flesh in the holy place.
sentences.cn: 你要将承接圣职所献公羊的肉煮在圣处.

sentences.en: As far as the eye could seethe beet fields.
sentences.cn: 极目远望,甜菜地一望无际.

sentences.en: Begun in 1884, the parts of the cathedral completed in Gaudi's time seethe with organic energy.
sentences.cn: 该建筑的建造始于1884年, 高迪在世时建成的部分充满了激动人心的有机力量.

sentences.en: Computation must seethe and behave as if it is alive.
sentences.cn: 计算必须活泼泼地翻腾、表现.

sentences.en: It makes my lukewarm water seethe.
My frame takes no rest by night; my inward parts seethe and will not be stilled.
sentences.cn: 夜间痛苦刺透我骨, 我的脉络都不得安息.

sentences.en: Now the streets of both cities seethe with thousands of Hondas, Toyotas and Piaggios.
sentences.cn: 现在,这两个城市的街上能看到上千辆的本田 、 丰田和比亚乔(欧洲的摩托车品牌).

sentences.en: Seethe fireinthe sky, wefeelthe beating of our hearts together.
sentences.cn: 看圣火映红天空, 我们感到心儿在一起跳动.

sentences.en: She put a hand on her hip, grinning derisively, while I seethed with rage.
sentences.cn: 她把一只手叉着腰，嘲弄地咧嘴而笑，而此时我已怒火中烧。

sentences.en: She seethe outlines of the trees in the dim light.
sentences.cn: 朦胧中,她只看到树木的轮廓.
她由于愤怒而不能平静.

sentences.en: She took it calmly at first but under the surface was seething.
sentences.cn: 她起初处之泰然，但内心却是气呼呼的。

sentences.en: The Templar caste as a wholeand the zealots in particular , seethe with shame at this dishonor.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 这对具有极强荣誉感的圣堂武士来说是一种极大的侮辱.

sentences.en: Thou shalt not seethe a kid in his mother's milk.
sentences.cn: 不可用山羊羔母的奶煮山羊羔.

sentences.en: To be in an excited or agitated state; seethe .
sentences.cn: 激动，骚动处在一种激动或不安的状态；激动。

trans.tran_cn: 生闷气，翻滚，强压怒火，充满

trans.tran_en: When you are seething, you are very angry about something but do not express your feelings about it
